description.value: Creatures in your bond can communicate telepathically while within 120 feet of one another. As long as two bonded creatures are on the same plane of existence and both are alive, they remain aware of one another's present state, general direction and distance from one another, and if they're conscious, @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Unconscious], @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Dying], or dead. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.Network Spell]{Network Spell} action.
